name: Probably A Capable Rhythm Game
description:
Probably A Capable Rhythm Game is, you guessed it, a stylized rhythm game about desperately keeping your car in motion by pumping the engine’s cylinders yourself, and making sure not to ram directly into a wall. There’s also music. Because I guess you have a radio?

Controls are: A + D to pump your left and right pistons & <- + -> to move your car. Pistons must be pumped in time with the music, but you may move freely. If you’re feeling spunky, pump in double-time for bonus points!
